title: Kamala Harris Shrugs at Anti-Semitism
sub_head: ‘Your truth should not be suppressed,’ she tells a student who denounces Israel and America.
body:
A student at George Mason University complained about Congress last month. The allocation of U.S. funds to the Iron Dome, Israel’s missile-defense system, “hurts my heart,” she said, “because it’s an ethnic genocide and displacement of people, the same that happened in America.”
In response to the student’s comment, America’s vice president nodded. “Your truth should not be suppressed,” she said.
